name: BEWBEWBEW (itch)
description:
BEWBEWBEW is a lovingly crafted, unique, and colorful action-arcade game!

Completely original fighting system (kinda neat)! Charge spawns before releasing them in one big wave. Fights are all about optimizing your move usage to hit as many spawns as possible.

A ton of playable characters and abilities! 20+ characters, each with their own set of abilities from a pool of 60+ unique moves of different types, elements, and usage. No two characters play the same!

Partake in intense 1-vs-1 and whole party fights! Each side can have up to 3 party members. Hectically switching between your party to burn through all cooldowns is key!

(Almost) completely hand-drawn graphics! Nearly every sprite and background in this game were drawn on paper before being digitally covered, all done to make the art pop out.

Combine different attacks for devastating effects! Set embers ablaze to start a fire! Place down a lightning rod before using a shock attack to do massive damage! Plant seeds and attack your foes with wild vines!

Play through 20+ fun levels! Some levels have unique twists and conditions. Be ready!

Want to add YOUR original character to the game? Go here!

Donations appreciated but not advised. However, if you did like the game, consider subscribing to the Patreon!

This is a very early alpha of the game, distributed as a demo.
